EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_DevOps Days Austin_Q215.DevOps Days v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at DevOps Days Austin!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for visiting Pivotal at DevOps Days Austin! It was great to see you.
In case you missed anything, we have made it easy for you to find related material, as well as links.
- View Coté's presentation: The Coming Donkey Apocalypse <http://www.slideshare.net/cote/the-coming-donkey-apocalypse-devopsdays-austin-2015> - Download a free copy of Matt Stine's Microservices eBook <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=langingpagetext&utm_term=StineBook&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAustin> - Receive a 60 day trial of Pivotal Web Services <http://try.run.pivotal.io/DevOpsDaysAustin?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=langingpagetext&utm_term=FreePWS&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAustin> - Want more? DevOps podcasts and more: planning for success <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/news-2/how-to-write-about-paas-and-devops-without-once-typing-paas?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=landingpagelinks&utm_term=DevOpsPlanning&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAustin>, staffing and organizing <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/news-2/organizing-for-devops-success?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=landingpagelinks&utm_term=DevOpsStaffing&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAustin>, and Coté and Andrew Clay Shafer talk about DevOps <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal/features/devops-you-keep-using-that-word-what-is-devops-a-discussion-and-history>.
Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blogs <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal>, podcasts <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal>, and on Twitter <https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
